sentences.cn: 对于那些反对该方案的人，他表现得很不耐烦。

sentences.cn: 将各种因素综合起来看，我们做得不差。

sentences.cn: 她就是个爱撒谎、爱算计的小巫婆！

sentences.cn: 新娘的家人在密谋阻止婚礼。

sentences.cn: 该公司要向该计划注资约3,000万美元。

sentences.cn: 市长的方案激励了打算在曼哈顿下城开业的公司。

sentences.cn: 该方案主要的受益者是北部和中部地区的人们。

sentences.cn: 该方案提供种子基金融资，其贷款只收取4%的利息。

trans.tran_en: an official plan that is intended to help people in some way, for example by providing education or training
a clever plan, especially to do something that is bad or illegal – used in order to show disapproval
If you say that people are scheming, you mean that they are making secret plans in order to gain something for themselves
